fr.umlv.jphoto.cela.data
Class AbstractPicture

java.lang.Object
  fr.umlv.jphoto.cela.data.AbstractPicture
All Implemented Interfaces:
Picture
public class AbstractPicture
extends java.lang.Object
implements Picture

A class which implements interface Picture. This class is use to represents the picture's files found on the filesystem.

Author:
cfodouop

getPictureLastModifiedDate

public long getPictureLastModifiedDate()
(non-Javadoc)

Specified by:
getPictureLastModifiedDate in interface Picture
Returns:
A long value representing the time the file was last modified, measured in milliseconds since the epoch (00:00:00 GMT, January 1, 1970), or 0L if the file does not exist or if an I/O error occurs
See Also:
